languages.text: "Я... понимаю. Будет нелегко, но нам лучше забыть о случившемся". {n}Кассия невольно касается припухших губ, и неловкое молчание повисает в воздухе.{/n} "Давайте же покинем это ужасное место, {name}. Я больше не могу здесь находиться".

traits.locale_text: "Я... понимаю. Будет нелегко, но нам лучше забыть о случившемся". {n}Кассия невольно касается припухших губ, и неловкое молчание повисает в воздухе.{/n} "Давайте же покинем это ужасное место, {name}. Я больше не могу здесь находиться".

languages.text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."
languages.original_text: "Я... понимаю. Будет нелегко, но нам лучше забыть о случившемся". {n}Кассия невольно касается припухших губ, и неловкое молчание повисает в воздухе.{/n} "Давайте же покинем это ужасное место, {name}. Я больше не могу здесь находиться".

traits.locale_text: "I... I understand. It will be difficult, but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips, and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

"I... I understand. It will be difficult, but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips, and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

"I, uh, I understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

"I, uh, I understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

"I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

"I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

languages.text: 「私…分かりました。難しいかもしれませんが、このことは忘れるのが一番ですね」{n}カシアは思わず唇に触れ、まずい沈黙が空気中に漂う。{/n}「ここを出ましょう、{name}。これ以上この場所にいたくありません」
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

traits.locale_text: 「私…分かりました。難しいかもしれませんが、このことは忘れるのが一番ですね」{n}カシアは思わず唇に触れ、まずい沈黙が空気中に漂う。{/n}「ここを出ましょう、{name}。これ以上この場所にいたくありません」

languages.text: “我……我能理解。尽管这有点困难，但我们最好还是忘记刚刚发生的事情。”{n}卡西娅不由自主地摸了摸嘴唇，空气中笼罩着尴尬的沉默。{/n}“我们快离开这个可怕的地方吧，{name}。这个地方我已经再也待不下去了。”
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

traits.locale_text: “我，呃，我能理解。尽管这有点困难，但我们最好还是忘记刚刚发生的事情。”{n}卡西娅不由自主地摸了摸嘴唇，空气中笼罩着尴尬的沉默。{/n}“我们快离开这个可怕的地方吧，{name}。这个地方我已经再也待不下去了。”

languages.text: «Lo... lo entiendo. Será difícil, pero lo mejor es que olvidemos lo ocurrido». {n}Cassia se toca inconscientemente los labios y un incómodo silencio permanece en el aire.{/n} «Marchémonos de este horrible lugar, {name}. No quiero seguir aquí ni por un instante más».
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

traits.locale_text: «Lo... lo entiendo. Será difícil, pero lo mejor es que olvidemos lo ocurrido». {n}Cassia se toca inconscientemente los labios y un incómodo silencio permanece en el aire.{/n} «Marchémonos de este horrible lugar, {name}. No quiero seguir aquí ni por un instante más».

languages.text: "Ich ... verstehe. Es wird nicht leicht werden, doch es ist das Beste, wenn wir einfach vergessen, was geschehen ist." {n}Cassia berührt unbewusst ihre Lippen. Ein betretenes Schweigen hängt in der Luft.{/n} "Lasst uns diese Hölle verlassen, {name}. Ich ertrage es nicht, noch länger zu bleiben."
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

traits.locale_text: "Ich, äh, ich verstehe. Es wird nicht leicht werden, doch es ist das Beste, wenn wir einfach vergessen, was geschehen ist." {n}Cassia berührt unbewusst ihre Lippen. Ein betretenes Schweigen hängt in der Luft.{/n} "Lasst uns diese Hölle verlassen, {name}. Ich ertrage es nicht, noch länger hier zu sein."

languages.text: « Je... comprends. Ce ne sera pas facile, mais nous ferions mieux d'oublier ce qui s'est passé, » {n}affirme Cassia en se caressant inconsciemment les lèvres tandis qu'un silence gênant s'installe.{/n} « Quittons ce lieu maudit, {name}. Je ne veux pas rester ici une minute de plus. »
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

traits.locale_text: « Je... je comprends. Ce ne sera pas facile, mais nous ferions mieux d'oublier ce qu'il s'est passé, » {n}affirme Cassia en se caressant inconsciemment les lèvres tandis qu'un silence gênant s'installe.{/n} « Quittons ce lieu maudit, {name}. Je ne veux pas rester ici une minute de plus. »

languages.text: "Anlıyorum... Zor olsa da en iyisi, olanları unutalım." {n}Cassia, istemsizce dudaklarına dokunurken ortama gergin bir sessizlik çöküyor.{/n} "Artık bu korkunç yerden gidebilir miyiz {name}? Burada daha fazla kalmak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air.{/n} "Let us leave this terrible place, {name}. I cannot bear to stay here any longer."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum... Zor olsa da, en iyisi olanları unutalım." {n}Cassia istemsizce dudaklarına dokunurken ortama gergin bir sessizlik çöküyor.{/n} "Artık bu korkunç ortamdan gidebilir miyiz {name}? Daha fazla burada kalmak istemiyorum."
